snippet.title: Knight Foretold - Gameplay/Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Knight Foretold is a fully-fledged, single player Action-RPG, set in a mediaeval fantasy world, with Gear, Weapons, Blacksmithing, Action Combat, Parkour, Loot, and of course, Soul!

As a young blacksmith forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest. Through Him your armour receives special blessings, enhancing your combat abilities, and leading you down the path of an old prophecy.

Fulfil the Prophecy of Old....you are the Knight Foretold!

Wishlist on STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2446990/Knight_Foretold/

Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/SickingerStudio
Follow on Discord - https://discord.gg/7heVJTMNxh

Support on KICKSTARTER - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sickingerstudio/knight-foretold/
